meanings.definition: Of or relating to the chest or breast.
meanings.sent1: She admired his strong pectorals as he lifted the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined her pectorals to check for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The pectorals on the statue made it look like it had a well-defined chest.
meanings.sent4: The pectorals of the mountain rose majestically against the sky.
meanings.sent5: The pectorals of the bird flapped gracefully as it took flight.

meanings.definition: A muscle of the chest, especially the large muscle in the upper chest.
meanings.sent1: He focused on strengthening his pectorals during his workout routine.
meanings.sent2: The bodybuilder's pectorals were well-defined and impressive.
meanings.sent3: The pectorals of the weightlifter were so strong, they could lift heavy weights effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: His pectorals bulged with every movement, showing his dedication to fitness.
meanings.sent5: The athlete felt a twinge in his pectorals after a particularly intense training session.
